name: Blindness (Notexq)
description:
A horror game. Not everyone will be able to find the root of this story. Collect pieces of history and see the light! By solving puzzles you will move through the story. You think that you already know that the plot of this game will be about a blind man, you are terribly wrong

---Control---

A W S D - move

E - interaction

Shift - run

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

P.S. If you cannot cope with the first puzzle, wait for a hint
